comments:
I cannot use any of the views included with core tools 1.2.0 from the website. 
I get this error in the log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi 2005-07-09 14:24:07.695
!MESSAGE An error occurred while automatically activating bundle
org.eclipse.core.tools (93).
!STACK 0 
org.osgi.framework.BundleException: The activator

        at

org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleContextImpl.start(BundleContextImpl.java:965)

I first tried to get the core tools plugin from the update site below, but it
was a much older version.  However, it did not work either, and gave an error
similar to the one shown above.
  http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-core-home/updates

If I get org.eclipse.core.tools from CVS, it seems to work OK in a runtime
workspace.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 102454 ***
